Strong’s Hebrew (H-numbers)

Strong’s Hebrew entries (H-numbers) index the Hebrew and Aramaic words used in the Old Testament. (TBD)

What the H-numbers Represent (TBD)

This section will describe how Strong’s assigns “H” numbers to distinct Hebrew and Aramaic lexemes, and what information is typically included. (TBD)
